Looking to contribute to an existing project? Visit our

Get access to up to 5000 Dai of funding by proposing your own idea. We use Community Development Initiative Proposals (CDIPs) to determine the financing of self-directed projects. A CDIP is the scoping and framing tool for anyone interested in receiving funds for proposing new MakerDAO community initiatives or resources.
Ryan Cordell revamped the content in our Community Portal to help us migrate from GitBooks.
@asterix modified the transparency dashboard to highlight data on Community Development initiatives like hackathons and meetups.
created a bot for Maker Chat that responds to commands and provides community members with resources and protocol data.
translated our walk-through video guides for MakerDAO products into Spanish.

if you want to know more about submitting a community project idea.
